basic.description: Intensive study (in translation) of the major epics of classical antiquity: Homer, Hesiod, Apollonios, Vergil and Lucan in the context of the oral and literate heroic traditions. Comparative study of English heroic poetry encouraged.
basic.subject: CLST
basic.title: Greek and Roman Epic

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite      CLST100 or (CLST102 and CLST103) or CLST101 or permission of the Department.
